original_text: saying, “What shall we do with these men? For that a notable sign has been performed through them is evident to all the inhabitants of Jerusalem, and we cannot deny it.
korean_text: 이 사람들을 어떻게 할까 그들로 말미암아 유명한 표적 나타난 것이 예루살렘에 사는 모든 사람에게 알려졌으니 우리도 부인할 수 없는지라

sentences.original_text: What shall we do with these men?
For that a notable sign has been performed through them
is evident to all the inhabitants of Jerusalem,
